boatAsJson.map:
(doc)->
 if doc?
  if doc.owner? && doc.owner.length? && doc.owner.length > 0
   emit "#{doc.owner}#{doc._id}", doc
  if doc.crew? && doc.crew.length? && doc.crew.length > 0
   for crew_member of doc.crew
    emit "#{crew_member}#{doc._id}", doc

boatsAsJson.map:
(doc)->
 if doc?

  if doc.crew? && doc.crew.length? && doc.crew.length > 0

validate_doc_update:
(newDoc,oldDoc,userCtx)->
 if oldDoc? and !newDoc._deleted? and newDoc.owner isnt oldDoc.owner
  throw forbidden: 'old and new user dont match'
